flawed_nl_solution:
When Jerry reads 30 pages on Saturday, he would be remaining with 93-30 = <<93-30=36>>36 pages.
After reading an additional 20 pages on Sunday, he would be remaining with 36 - 20 = <<36-20=16>>16 pages.
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63, not 36. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
